TopicTitle: Orbit scan says that there is no ore on kerbin.

Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I recently launched a mining satellite around Kerbin. The overlay and some of the number says that there is 0 ore (or any other resource) on Kerbin. The overlay just covers the entire world no matter what cutoff I apply to it. When I do a scan on the ground though, the readings give me normal readouts about the concentration.

 

Mod that would possibly effect this:

stock alike mining expansion:

Community resource pack:

All mods are installed via CKAN and are for version 1.2.2.
